Package org.kuali.kfs.module.bc.document.validation

Interface Summary
AddBudgetConstructionDocumentRule<D extends BudgetConstructionDocument> Defines a rule for adding (creating) a new Budget Construction Document.
AddPendingBudgetGeneralLedgerLineRule<D extends BudgetConstructionDocument,P extends PendingBudgetConstructionGeneralLedger> Defines a rule for adding PendingBudgetGeneralLedgerLine rows to a Budget Construction Document.
BudgetExpansionRule Defines rule methods for handling expansion events.
DeleteMonthlySpreadRule<D extends BudgetConstructionDocument> This class...
DeletePendingBudgetGeneralLedgerLineRule<D extends BudgetConstructionDocument,P extends PendingBudgetConstructionGeneralLedger> Defines a rule for deleting PendingBudgetGeneralLedgerLine rows from a Budget Construction Document.
SalarySettingRule Rule classes wishing to respond to that event should implement this interface.
SaveMonthlyBudgetRule<D extends BudgetConstructionDocument,M extends BudgetConstructionMonthly> Defines a rule for saving a Budget Construction Monthly, invoked when the user saves when using the Monthly Budget screen
